title: ChestCommands插件问题
author: 龙玉涛
txt_content: {:10_523:}ChestCommands插件怎么设置成可以用指令打开比如/cmd打开指令菜单@上白丶慧泽音

replies.author: qq200877776
replies.txt_content:
menu-settings:

  name: '&5&l快捷指令菜单'
  rows: 6
  command: 'cmd'  这是指令不需要'/'
  open-action: 'sound: note pling; tell: &e指令菜单已打开!.'复制代码

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
menu-settings:
  name: '&5&l快捷指令'
  rows: 3
  command: cmd     <<<<<<<把这里改了就行 不管什么都可以哦
